Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta.validators

Validators provide a common interface for objects that validate the state of other objects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Validator<T> A Validator validates a value, according to some validation rules.
 

Class Summary
AbstractValidator Basic abstract Validator.
ExpressionValidator Validates a String against a regular expression.
MaxValueValidator<T extends Comparable<T>> Max value length validator.
MinValueValidator<T extends Comparable<T>> Max value length validator.
MultipleValidatorsValidator<T> Validates an object with multiple Validators and throws a single ValidationException with all relevant messages.
NotNegativeValidator Validates that a number is not negative.
NotNullValidator Validates that an object is not null.
NotZeroValidator Validates that a number is not zero.
NumberDecimalLengthValidator<T extends Number> Validates a Number based on a maximum length for its decimal part.
NumberIntegerLengthValidator<T extends Number> Validates a Number based on a maximum length for its integer part.
StringMaxLengthValidator Max string length validator.
StringMinLengthValidator Minimum string length validator.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta.validators Description

Validators provide a common interface for objects that validate the state of other objects.
